item.title: ~~~~~~~~~~can u keep ur server running if...~~~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

This made me laugh, we can’t tell you the chances. Why would he care it’s not an illegal act. You could hide your server files and hide the batch file so it doesn’t appear on your task bar when you run it. If your using a wireless connection you have to leave your laptop open, if your using a wired connection you can shut your laptop.
